results.name: Super Mario só que quadrado (Ultimo Update)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 (2 * 2000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 (2 * 2000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
